resources.string: MELHAM CONSTRUCTION CORPORATION (MCC), first registered on February 2020 in the Philippine government situated at no.27 commonwealth avenue Diliman north Fairview Quezon City.
Melham Construction Company exists to meet the country’s growing demand for industrialization through diverse specializations, ensuring that each task is handled professionally.

This is achieved with the best construction techniques at economical prices to establish client satisfaction and trust. we handle operations with care, resulting in guaranteed high-quality results that meet the clients’ needs.

To become one of the country’s caterers of the growing demand of industrialization that brings innovation to the people, all the while having affordable prices with guaranteed quality and efficient service.
Gathering all the necessary information and carefully planning the design to meet client’s prerequisites.
Integrating designs and carrying out the job with quality and efficiency.
Handling operations with diligence producing a quality building that satisfies client’s needs.
